thread.title: Great location with casement doors on some rooms that open
thread.title_full: Great location with casement doors on some rooms that open - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: clf1967
title: Great location with casement doors on some rooms that open
text:
We got the balcony room with a view that had casement doors that opened (looking over the Tuileries Garden with the Eiffel Tower to our right and the Louvre and Notre Dame to our left)...was so wonderful to really expand our view plus enjoy the sights and sounds of Paris!
Plenty to do within a few feet of your hotel but also fairly centrally located to a number of the sights (boy...I put some miles on my feet that trip but it was worth it!).
Nice restaurant as well as cocktail lounge in the hotel.
Room Tip: See the notes in my description See more room tips
